qa-2026-02-10-e2e-major-failure-rate.title: Full E2E Chromium run still not clean
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-major-failure-rate.details: A fresh full run was restarted and progressed substantially better than baseline: first 18 tests reached 14 passed / 4 failed before forced termination. A complete green full-suite validation is still pending.

qa-2026-02-10-local-test-services-health.title: Locally spawned E2E services show intermittent internal health read timeouts
qa-2026-02-10-local-test-services-health.details: During reruns, backend logs repeatedly show read timeouts for inter-service /health checks (especially 5501/5502). This likely contributes to cross-suite flakiness and needs stabilization or isolated execution mode.

qa-2026-02-10-hub-flow-timeout.title: Hub flow E2E fails to complete local task execution path
qa-2026-02-10-hub-flow-timeout.details: `tests/hub-flow.spec.ts` failed in full-run progression (`create task and execute via hub locally`). Needs deterministic completion signal and less timing-sensitive assertion path.

qa-2026-02-10-audit-logs-fixture-asserti.title: Audit logs E2E does not render expected seeded rows
qa-2026-02-10-audit-logs-fixture-asserti.details: `audit-logs.spec.ts` remains reproducibly red in full-run progression. Needs deterministic fixture setup and explicit readiness check before row assertions.

qa-2026-02-10-llm-suite-contract.title: LLM suites need clear separation of mock and live-provider paths
qa-2026-02-10-llm-suite-contract.details: `llm-config.spec.ts` passed in the latest full-run progression, but `llm-generate.spec.ts` failed in both checked assertions. Separate deterministic mock assertions from explicit live-provider jobs and harden response expectations.

qa-2026-02-10-e2e-hub-healthcheck-timeou.title: waitForHub setup timeout mitigated but still noisy
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-hub-healthcheck-timeou.details: waitForHub was bounded and made non-fatal in tests/utils.ts, eliminating prior hard setup aborts in focused auth runs. Remaining warning logs show occasional hub readiness lag and should be cleaned up for deterministic startup.

qa-2026-02-10-teams-templates-api-e2e.title: Teams and templates API E2E flows still need full-run confirmation
qa-2026-02-10-teams-templates-api-e2e.details: Earlier full baseline showed repeated failures in teams/templates suites. Latest rerun was interrupted before full completion, so a post-fix end-to-end confirmation is still required.

qa-2026-02-10-e2e-log-noise-404-endpoint.title: Reduce recurring 404 noise for /events and /stats/history
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-log-noise-404-endpoint.details: Frequent 404s are mostly non-blocking but hide actionable failures in logs. Align polling endpoints or add explicit test-mode no-op handlers.

qa-2026-02-10-e2e-bootstrap-performance.title: E2E global setup spends time on repeated startup work
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-bootstrap-performance.details: Using ANANTA_SKIP_PIP=1 improves loop speed, but startup remains expensive due repeated local service bootstrapping. Add cached/keep-alive local mode for iterative runs.

qa-2026-02-10-overcommit-warning.title: Redis vm.overcommit_memory host warning
qa-2026-02-10-overcommit-warning.details: Redis warns about vm.overcommit_memory=0. Non-blocking for tests, but host tuning should be added to setup docs/scripts.
